verses.verse: And the LORD <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H1696><s%> to Moses, <S%H4872><s%> Depart, <S%H3212><s%> and go <S%H5927><s%> up hence, <S%H2088><s%> you and the people <S%H5971><s%> which <S%H834><s%> you have brought <S%H5927><s%> up out of the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt, <S%H4714><s%> to the land <S%H776><s%> which <S%H834><s%> I swore <S%H7650><s%> to Abraham, <S%H85><s%> to Isaac, <S%H3327><s%> and to Jacob, <S%H3290><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> To your seed <S%H2233><s%> will I give <S%H5414><s%> it:

And I will send <S%H7971><s%> an angel <S%H4397><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> you; and I will drive <S%H1644><s%> out the Canaanite, <S%H3669><s%> the Amorite, <S%H567><s%> and the Hittite, <S%H2850><s%> and the Perizzite, <S%H6522><s%> the Hivite, <S%H2340><s%> and the Jebusite: <S%H2983><s%>

To a land <S%H776><s%> flowing <S%H2100><s%> with milk <S%H2461><s%> and honey: <S%H1706><s%> for I will not go <S%H5927><s%> up in the middle <S%H7130><s%> of you; for you are a stiff necked <S%H7186><s%> <S%H6203><s%> people: <S%H5971><s%> lest <S%H6435><s%> I consume <S%H3615><s%> you in the way. <S%H1870><s%>

And when the people <S%H5971><s%> heard <S%H8085><s%> these evil <S%H7451><s%> tidings, <S%H1697><s%> they mourned: <S%H56><s%> and no <S%H3808><s%> man <S%H376><s%> did put <S%H7896><s%> on him his ornaments. <S%H5716><s%>

For the LORD <S%H3068><s%> had said <S%H559><s%> to Moses, <S%H4872><s%> Say <S%H559><s%> to the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> You are a stiff necked <S%H7186><s%> <S%H6203><s%> people: <S%H5971><s%> I will come <S%H5927><s%> up into the middle <S%H7130><s%> of you in a moment, <S%H7281><s%> and consume <S%H3615><s%> you: therefore now <S%H6258><s%> put <S%H3381><s%> off your ornaments <S%H5716><s%> from you, that I may know <S%H3045><s%> what <S%H4100><s%> to do <S%H6213><s%> to you.
And the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> stripped <S%H5337><s%> themselves of their ornaments <S%H5716><s%> by the mount <S%H2022><s%> Horeb. <S%H2722><s%>

And Moses <S%H4872><s%> took <S%H3947><s%> the tabernacle, <S%H168><s%> and pitched <S%H5186><s%> it without <S%H2351><s%> the camp, <S%H4264><s%> afar <S%H7368><s%> off from the camp, <S%H4264><s%> and called <S%H7121><s%> it the Tabernacle <S%H168><s%> of the congregation. <S%H4150><s%> And it came <S%H1961><s%> to pass, that every <S%H3605><s%> one which sought <S%H1245><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> went <S%H3318><s%> out to the tabernacle <S%H168><s%> of the congregation, <S%H4150><s%> which <S%H834><s%> was without <S%H2351><s%> the camp. <S%H4264><s%>

And it came <S%H1961><s%> to pass, when Moses <S%H4872><s%> went <S%H3318><s%> out to the tabernacle, <S%H168><s%> that all <S%H3605><s%> the people <S%H5971><s%> rose <S%H6965><s%> up, and stood <S%H5324><s%> every <S%H376><s%> man <S%H376><s%> at his tent <S%H168><s%> door, <S%H6607><s%> and looked <S%H5027><s%> after <S%H310><s%> Moses, <S%H4872><s%> until <S%H5704><s%> he was gone <S%H935><s%> into the tabernacle. <S%H168><s%>

And it came <S%H1961><s%> to pass, as Moses <S%H4872><s%> entered <S%H935><s%> into the tabernacle, <S%H168><s%> the cloudy <S%H6051><s%> pillar <S%H5982><s%> descended, <S%H3381><s%> and stood <S%H5975><s%> at the door <S%H6607><s%> of the tabernacle, <S%H168><s%> and the Lord talked <S%H1696><s%> with Moses. <S%H4872><s%>

And all <S%H3605><s%> the people <S%H5971><s%> saw <S%H7200><s%> the cloudy <S%H6051><s%> pillar <S%H5982><s%> stand <S%H5975><s%> at the tabernacle <S%H168><s%> door: <S%H6607><s%> and all <S%H3605><s%> the people <S%H5971><s%> rose <S%H6965><s%> up and worshipped, <S%H7812><s%> every man <S%H376><s%> in his tent <S%H168><s%> door. <S%H6607><s%>

And the LORD <S%H3068><s%> spoke <S%H1696><s%> to Moses <S%H4872><s%> face <S%H6440><s%> to face, <S%H6440><s%> as a man <S%H376><s%> speaks <S%H1696><s%> to his friend. <S%H7453><s%> And he turned <S%H7725><s%> again <S%H7725><s%> into <S%H413><s%> the camp: <S%H4264><s%> but his servant <S%H8334><s%> Joshua, <S%H3091><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Nun, <S%H5126><s%> a young <S%H5288><s%> man, departed <S%H4185><s%> not out of the tabernacle. <S%H168><s%>

And Moses <S%H4872><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> See, <S%H7200><s%> you say <S%H559><s%> to me, Bring <S%H5927><s%> up this <S%H2088><s%> people: <S%H5971><s%> and you have not let me know <S%H3045><s%> whom <S%H853><s%> <S%H834><s%> you will send <S%H7971><s%> with me. Yet you have said, <S%H559><s%> I know <S%H3045><s%> you by name, <S%H8034><s%> and you have also <S%H1571><s%> found <S%H4672><s%> grace <S%H2580><s%> in my sight. <S%H5869><s%>

Now <S%H6258><s%> therefore, I pray <S%H4994><s%> you, if <S%H518><s%> I have found <S%H4672><s%> grace <S%H2580><s%> in your sight, <S%H5869><s%> show <S%H3045><s%> me now <S%H4994><s%> your way, <S%H1870><s%> that I may know <S%H3045><s%> you, that I may find <S%H4672><s%> grace <S%H2580><s%> in your sight: <S%H5869><s%> and consider <S%H7200><s%> that this nation <S%H1471><s%> is your people. <S%H5971><s%>
And he said, <S%H559><s%> My presence <S%H6440><s%> shall go <S%H3212><s%> with you, and I will give you rest. <S%H5117><s%>
And he said <S%H559><s%> to him, If <S%H518><s%> your presence <S%H6440><s%> go <S%H1980><s%> not with me, carry <S%H5927><s%> us not up hence. <S%H2088><s%>

For wherein <S%H4100><s%> shall it be known <S%H3045><s%> here <S%H645><s%> that I and your people <S%H5971><s%> have found <S%H4672><s%> grace <S%H2580><s%> in your sight? <S%H5869><s%> is it not in that you go <S%H3212><s%> with us? so shall we be separated, <S%H6395><s%> I and your people, <S%H5971><s%> from all <S%H3605><s%> the people <S%H5971><s%> that are on the face <S%H6440><s%> of the earth. <S%H127><s%>

And the LORD <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to Moses, <S%H4872><s%> I will do <S%H6213><s%> this <S%H2088><s%> thing <S%H1697><s%> also <S%H1571><s%> that you have spoken: <S%H1696><s%> for you have found <S%H4672><s%> grace <S%H2580><s%> in my sight, <S%H5869><s%> and I know <S%H3045><s%> you by name. <S%H8034><s%>
And he said, <S%H559><s%> I beseech <S%H4994><s%> you, show <S%H7200><s%> me your glory. <S%H3519><s%>

And he said, <S%H559><s%> I will make all <S%H3605><s%> my goodness <S%H2898><s%> pass <S%H5674><s%> before <S%H5921><s%> <S%H6440><s%> you, and I will proclaim <S%H7121><s%> the name <S%H8034><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> you; and will be gracious <S%H2603><s%> to whom <S%H853><s%> <S%H834><s%> I will be gracious, <S%H2603><s%> and will show mercy <S%H7355><s%> on whom <S%H853><s%> <S%H834><s%> I will show mercy. <S%H7355><s%>
And he said, <S%H559><s%> You can <S%H3201><s%> not see <S%H7200><s%> my face: <S%H6440><s%> for there shall no <S%H3808><s%> man <S%H120><s%> see <S%H7200><s%> me, and live. <S%H2425><s%>
And the LORD <S%H3068><s%> said, <S%H559><s%> Behold, <S%H2009><s%> there is a place <S%H4725><s%> by me, and you shall stand <S%H5324><s%> on a rock: <S%H6697><s%>

And it shall come <S%H1961><s%> to pass, while <S%H5704><s%> my glory <S%H3519><s%> passes <S%H5674><s%> by, that I will put <S%H7760><s%> you in a cleft <S%H5366><s%> of the rock, <S%H6697><s%> and will cover <S%H5526><s%> you with my hand <S%H3709><s%> while <S%H5704><s%> I pass <S%H5674><s%> by:
And I will take <S%H5493><s%> away my hand, <S%H3709><s%> and you shall see <S%H7200><s%> my back <S%H268><s%> parts: but my face <S%H6440><s%> shall not be seen. <S%H7200><s%>
